or no novelty in the facts the 
author passes in review, while 
it is very doubtful whether 
the review is as complete as 
it should be.
The paper therefore does 
not appear to me a desirable 
one for the Philosophical 
Transactions.
Many people are interested 
in the subject treated on, and 
Prof. Lankester (having com-
municated the paper to the 
Society) no doubt considers 
it of value; moreover the 
proposed figures if well 
arranged and satisfactorily 
executed would certainly
